name: ai-task
displayName: AI Task: Proactive Coding Assistant, automatically search errors, perform multi-file edits and more!
description: Use comments with @task to perform multi-file changes, automatically get your errors in console searched on the web and more!

commands.title: AI Task: Address @task comments in opened tabs
AI Task: Create a new task notebook

ai-task.taskMentionIdentifier.description: Override the keyword the LLM uses when searching for its task

ai-task.ignorePatterns.description: Directories and files to exclude when adding files to context for example from active tabs or files with @task mentions

ai-task.userId.description: User ID to use for by default anonymous analytics

ai-task.markdownOrNotebook.description: Output of the main logs to a markdown document or notebook

walkthroughs.title: Use AI Task
walkthroughs.description: Learn how to create a notebook using our shortcut.

steps.title: Create new AI Task Chat
steps.description:
To create a new notebook quickly:
- Focus on the editor.
- Press `Cmd+U` on Mac or `Ctrl+U` on Windows.
A new notebook will be created!

scripts.build: npx rimraf out/ && tsc --build && npm run bundle:prod
scripts.------------section-extension-packaging-: Refactor: move package + publishing to the install-local script and have it accept --publish --package-and-install-local
scripts.package: npm run build && .\node_modules\.bin\vsce package --ignoreFile configurations\.vscodeignore --no-dependencies --ignoreFile  configurations\.vscodeignore --allow-star-activation --githubBranch main
scripts.publish: npm run test && npm run bundle:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/vsce publish --no-dependencies --ignoreFile  configurations/.vscodeignore --allow-star-activation --githubBranch main
scripts.publish:bypass-test: npm run bundle:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/vsce publish --no-dependencies --ignoreFile  configurations/.vscodeignore --allow-star-activation --githubBranch main
